info.title: Scilab API

message.example: There is no experiment with that id.

items.example: The name field must be a string.

The output field must be a valid JSON string.

message.example: You don't have permission to edit this experiment.

get.description: Returns a user based on ID

get.description: Returns a user info based on provided API token
